snippet.title: Pokemon Type: Wild - Gengar (Hard Mode) [With All Pokemon's Dreams]
snippet.description:
Disclaimer: These songs are copyrighted by their respective owners, therefore, I do not own this audio.

What's this? A video where I actually lose a match?! Since for some reason the battle BGMs won't play when I play the game, I added my own random non-Pokemon related music.

Gengar has the most random command list the game. I'm not kidding. And there are many other glitches that are caused by playing as Gengar, but I can't always get it to work.

This video contains an extra that shows all the dreams of all the Pokemon in the game.

~~~

Gengar's moveset for dummies~!

1) Shadow Ball (Able to do in air): ← (Hold) → + Any Punch Button [As in hold the button opposite of the direction you're facing for a while, then press forward along with any punch button; hard punch sends the projectile faster while light punch sends it slower]
2) Sucker Punch: Press both Punch Buttons at once [Press the hard and light punch buttons at the same time.]
3) Payback: →↘↓↙← + Any Kick Button [Half-circle command, don't just move the D-Pad or arcade stick left to right, make sure you actually do a half circle; a counterattack but it doesn't always work]
4) Poison Jab: ↓↙← + Any Punch Button [A very spammable attack that may inflict poison; don't use it on Breloom because of it's Poison Heal]
Special 1) Hypnosis: →↘↓↙←↙↓↘→ + Any Punch Button [Half-circle back and then go half circle foward, however I can usually pull off this special doing {→↘↓↙←→ + Any Punch Button} just as well]
Special 2) Dream Eater: ↓↘→↓↘→ + Any Punch Button [You cannot use this special unless your opponent is asleep, so use Hyponsis to put them to sleep, however Snorlax can put itself to sleep using Rest, so that works too]

~~~

Song List:

Combusken: World 5 Theme (Elebits: The Adventures of Kai and Zero)
Snorlax: Masked Dedede Remix (iR2-X from Newgrounds)
Lucario: 欲望の果てに (Solatorobo)
Breloom: Heavenly Flight (Dragon Quest VIII)
Swalot: Fate of Sixty Years (Touhou Project 9: Phantasmagoria of Flower View)

Extra Stuff: Sinful Rose (Disgaea 2)
